name: oak table
description: Solid oak is an environmentally friendly material, it is non-toxic and completely safe for health

name: work chair
description: Provides softness and comfort, while the adjustable seat and backrest tilt and height provide optimal support. This chair will serve you for years to come.

name: table lamp
description: To keep the price low, we have discarded the box for this product. Thanks to its expressive design, the lamp will fit into any interior and make even the darkest corner of your home cozy.
